tweet:
FedEx $FDX infrastructure milestone in 2025:

700 aircraft in fleet, handling 18M packages daily.

Major hub: 🇺🇸Memphis, TN – 4M sq ft sorting facility.

🇺🇸 Large metros: Last-mile delivery costs $15 per parcel in 2025.

🇮🇳 Large metros: $0.75 per parcel.

Projections show US costs rising 8% annually through 2030 due to urban congestion and labor shortages, while India's efficient density model holds costs steady.
category: last-mile delivery costs per parcel in large metros

UPS's 🇺🇸 Louisville Worldport processes 416,000 packages per hour.

This infrastructure hub handles 24 million daily shipments globally in 2025.

$UPS

2025 projection: Global parcel lockers reach 1.4 million units.

🇨🇳 China leads with 550,000 (39%), vs. 🇺🇸 US at 70,000 (5%).
category: parcel locker and pickup-point networks globally

title: Royal Mail: Introducing electric HGVs into our network is a major milestone
summary: Royal Mail has rolled out its first fleet of eight electric Heavy Goods Vehicles (eHGVs) at its Midlands and North West Parcel Hubs. The launch is a major step forward in reducing the company’s carbon emissions by replacing diesel-powered 42-tonne trucks with zero-emission alternatives.

title: Scurri: Shoppers are sending retailers a clear message on AI
summary: New consumer research commissioned by delivery management and post-purchase experience provider Scurri reveals that while 60% believe AI enhances the shopping experience, a striking 81% say they would feel uneasy if AI replaced human jobs in retail and logistics.
